post_detail.title: Raison D'Être
post_detail.description:
Compelling, shareable content has become the primary catalyst for interactions between brands and consumers. Raison D'etre creates digital engagements and video content focusing on fashion, luxury, and beauty brands.

In a transmedia world, we bring the firepower and support of our parent company Click 3X and its interactive division ClickFire Media, to concept, design and execute entirely under one roof in our state-of-the-art studios here in Manhattan, creating across the entire spectrum of the media landscape from the big screen to mobile

Insights, ideation of full concepts
Design, motion graphic and interactive
Website Development including information architecture & UX, utilizing numerous platforms including .Net, Drupal, Ajax, AS3, HTML5 etc.
Integration of social media platforms and their APIs including Facebook, Google Maps & Instagram etc.
Mobile full app development in IOS and Android as well as mobile-compatible websites.
Live action filming - location or studio using our own fully equipped sound stage with blue/green screen
Vast array of post production including creative editorial, visualFX, audio sound design, music & mix
Animation: traditional, Flash, 3D and photo-real
Outreach & Seeding – paid viral and influencer campaigns
